articles.title: Jaiveer Shergill Resigns As Congress Spokesperson With Dig At Gandhis
articles.description: Congress leader Jaiveer Shergill resigned as the party's national spokesperson today with sharp jabs at the Gandhis in a letter that said the "vision of the party's decision-makers is no longer in sync" with the aspirations of the youth.
articles.content:
Jaiveer Shergill, a lawyer, is among the prominent young faces of the party.

articles.title: "No-Fly Zone" For Drones Around Noida Twin Towers For Sunday Demolition
articles.description: Drones will not be allowed to fly in the "exclusion zone" of Supertech's illegal twin towers when they will be demolished on August 28, officials said on Wednesday.

articles.title: Haryana BJP leader Sonali Phogat’s brother claims she was murdered in Goa
articles.description: Accuses two of her associates of murdering her in Goa, says she sounded disturbed in her last conversation with family and complained against her two colleagues, post-mortem yet to be conducted
articles.content:

articles.title: Overnight protests in Hyderabad after BJP MLA Raja Singh granted bail
